snippet.title: Story trailer - Rain of Reflections
snippet.description:
This “story trailer” introduces the three main protagonists - Wilona, Dwennon and Imra - each with a unique perspective on the events that unfold. The player controls each one consecutively, shaping a unique story through choices along their intersecting paths.

Rain of Reflections is an atmospheric, dystopian adventure game. Its turn-based strategic confrontations are uniquely centered around a motivation mechanic. Every move and choice made by the player as the three different protagonists is permanent and will have consequences on the world and its characters.

See the cinematic version of the trailer in 21:9 aspect ratio at: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9CC8JvIMvm4

Learn more about the game at http://rainofreflections.com.
